title: 3 Day Tour from Lima: Nazca Lines Flight, Paracas, and Huacachina
description: Discover the mystifying Nazca Lines, spectacular Paracas National Reserve, and enchanting Huacachina oasis on a 3-day group tour from Lima. In Paracas, you'll observe sea lions, penguins, and other exotic marine life on a boat tour of Paracas Bay. Later experience the thrill of sandboarding in Huacachina's golden dunes. The multi-day adventure concludes with a flight over the desert to get a bird’s eye view of the ancient geoglyphs.
all_descriptions: Discover the mystifying Nazca Lines, spectacular Paracas National Reserve, and enchanting Huacachina oasis on a 3-day group tour from Lima. In Paracas, you'll observe sea lions, penguins, and other exotic marine life on a boat tour of Paracas Bay. Later experience the thrill of sandboarding in Huacachina's golden dunes. The multi-day adventure concludes with a flight over the desert to get a bird’s eye view of the ancient geoglyphs.

reviews.title: Best tour in Peru
reviews.text: Everything was well organized and well put together. Bus was nice also. The best part of the trip was the guide Jose Carlos. He made every activity that much better. Extremely nice, helpful, and funny. Wouldn’t have enjoyed the trip nearly as much as I did if I had a different guide.

reviews.title: Thank you
reviews.text: Thanks Miguel and Moni for the pleasant experience and positive vibe. Especially passing in to the Bolivia border, it was seamless

reviews.title: Thanks, Alvaro!
reviews.text: Alvaro is our guide on the Huacachina/Lima return bus trip. Thorough, professional, caring and helpful, and very warm, it is a great pleasure to have him as our guide. Muchas gracias, Alvaro!

reviews.title: Easiest 5 stars of my life
reviews.text: This was the most seamless, effortless and fantastic trip I have ever done. The company runs like clockwork and they are always ready to answer questions on WhatsApp. The bus itself is almost too good to be true, with perfect WiFi and lots of leg room.I was super lucky to have Raul as our guide who ensured it was an amazing trip. The highlight was the sunset on top of Huacachina, where we toasted with Pisco after an amazing few days. I can’t recommend Peru Hop enough.

reviews.title: Amazing 3 days trip (feat. Miguel)
reviews.text: The tour was amazing. We had so much fun. Everything is well organised and the communication is very clear. You will always be given enough time to enjoy the attactions. My personal highlight was the tourguide. His name is Miguel.  He is literally born to be a tourguide. He is the best. He has so much fun at work and transmits his joy onto the entire group. He absolutly deserves a raise.So as a sumup I can only recommend booking with PeruHop and hope you get Miguel as your guide.

reviews.title: On time and kept you well informed.
reviews.text: On time, reliable, keep to well informed, you can either take part in the Peru Hop trips or like us do your own thing.  The buses were comfortable considering the long distances we covered.  Hotel pick ups and drop off were welcome!  We felt that Peru Hop lived up to their website claims and was fair value.

reviews.title: Go with Miguel!!
reviews.text: Miguel is the BEST tour guide EVER!!  I have traveled a lot over the past 40 Years and Miguel was the absolute best !!!  Tour was super well organized and efficiently run.  Miguel was personable and professional and made such an effort to make sure we were all having a good time!

reviews.title: Out of this world!
reviews.text: We liked the tour and our guides Jean Pierre and Nilka. First two days were awesome. But on the third day the waiting time for the Nasca flight was too long. Amd this day of our 3 day tour was mostly on the road.

reviews.title: Warm hospitality
reviews.text: I’m a French traveler living in Chile, and I took advantage of a long weekend in September 2025 to fulfill a dream: visiting the legendary Nasca Lines. I chose the 3-day Peru Hop program (Paracas, Huacachina and Nasca) and I can only say: I L O V E D it.The organization was flawless, and the buses always departed on time – which is quite amazing considering the number of groups crisscrossing at each destination. The guides were professional, friendly, and truly made the experience enjoyable.A very special mention to Elmer, my host for the 3 days. His passion, enthusiasm, and deep love for his country were truly inspiring. I could hardly believe it when he told us this was only the second group he had ever guided. He did such an outstanding job that it felt like he had been doing this for years.An unforgettable experience, full of discoveries and emotions. I highly recommend Peru Hop to anyone wanting to explore Peru in a unique and well-organized way.

reviews.title: Amazing Tour operator in Peru
reviews.text: Amazing tour operator in Peru. I didn't know about Peru Hop, I only knew I wanted to do the Nazca Lines flight when I went to Lima and luckily for me Peru Hop came up on my search and I opted for them.From start to finish the 3 days tour was outstanding. The guides were superb, Juan Carlos, Nilka and  Angela couldn't have done enough for you, funny, energetic and knowledgeable.Now I know about Peru Hop I will be with them again on my next trip to Peru.5 stars guys, thanks for the laughs and memories.
